snippet: The eight-time champion Rafael Nadal saved 15 of 17 break points, and Andy Murray rallied from a set and 3-0 down as both advanced to the Monte Carlo Masters quarterfinals in Monaco....
lead_paragraph: The eight-time champion Rafael Nadal saved 15 of 17 break points, and Andy Murray rallied from a set and 3-0 down as both advanced to the Monte Carlo Masters quarterfinals in Monaco.

headline.print_headline: Nadal and Murray Advance in Monaco
headline.main: Nadal and Murray Advance in Monaco

abstract: Rafael Nadal beats Dominic Thiem to advance to quarterfinal at Monte Carlo Masters in Monaco; other tennis scores noted.
